name: CRAFT: Work VR Shop
description: We are working on a VR workshop which is connected to the physical fabrication factories. Currently we are able to produce the real object out from your making on woodturning lathe in CRAFT.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,windows8.1,windows10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
